steps.title: Initial Access
steps.description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad followed by the access code.

steps.title: Troubleshooting: Frozen Screen
steps.description: If the screen freezes or locks up after entering digits, repeatedly press any key until the screen goes blank and the red light blinks. This indicates the system has reset.

steps.title: Reaccessing After Reset
steps.description: After the screen resets, enter the four-digit code followed by the access code again.  The digits can be entered in any order.

steps.title: Successful Access
steps.description: The system should now be unlocked and accessible.
